item.title: Welcome!
item.description:
Posted by Wilson212:

Thank you for visiting Inferno Phoenix!

Website Still Under Development - Please Check Back Later

item.title: Server Running
item.description:
Posted by GOD:

Our Servers Are Now Live

Welcome to Inferno Phoenix. Our new 4.0.6a servers are now up and running. Please check the How To Play section for detail step by step instructions on how to connect. Please understand that the server does contain bugs so does the website, but with your help in posting the issues to our forum, we will fix the problems as soon as possible. Also the goblin starting area works some glitches of course but the worgan starting area is completely unplayable at the current moment. We will have this fixed as soon as possible.

item.title: Forum Soon Available
item.description: Posted by GOD: The new forum to our website will be up and running latter today :-) Check back later.
